pullRequest.title: Push 3.0.0 doc changes to master
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Push some commits on 3.0.0 branch to master

nodes.bodyText: @tgtshanika , shouldn't this URL be https://is.docs.wso2.com/en/5.10.0/learn/deploying-the-sample-app/#deploying-the-playground2-webapp instead of pointing to latest/..... as API-M 3.1.0 is compatible with 5.10.0. Whereas latest/... will change as the new IS product versions come out.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -63,7 +63,7 @@ The steps below show how access tokens are generated for the authorization code
 !!! note
     **Before you begin**
 
-    The following instructions use the sample playground webapp. For instructions on how to set up the sample webapp, see [Setting up the Sample Webapp](https://is.docs.wso2.com/en/5.9.0/develop/deploying-the-sample-app/) .
+    The following instructions use the sample playground webapp. For instructions on how to set up the sample webapp, see [Setting up the Sample Webapp](https://is.docs.wso2.com/en/latest/learn/deploying-the-sample-app/#deploying-the-playground2-webapp) .

nodes.bodyText: this link is not correct, right?

@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 # Write a Client Application Using the SDK
 
-1.  Follow the steps in the [Quick Start Guide](/getting-started/quick-start-guide), to deploy the sample API, subscribe and generate keys.

commit.message: Fixing broken link in sdk gen page
Updating component diagrams in get started page
Updating database and IS and KM diagrams
Moving Extensions docs under Develop top menu item

afterCommit.message: Moving Extensions docs under Develop top menu item
